p: 1-((1H-pyrrol-1-yl)methyl)-2-phenylcyclopropane-1-carboxylic acid (49). Purification by flash column chromatography using methanol/dichloromethane (1:99) afforded the product as beige powder in 63% yield. 1H NMR (300 MHz, CDCl 3) δ 7.44 − 7.21 (m, 5H), 6.57 (s, 2H), 6.08 (s, 2H), 4.51 (d, J = 15.1 Hz, 1H), 3.15 (dd, J = 17.8, 11.7 Hz, 2H), 1.92 (dd, J = 8.7, 5.6 Hz, 1H), 1.71 − 1.52 (m, 1H). 13 C NMR (75 MHz, CDCl 3) δ 179.6, 134.7, 128.8, 128.5, 127.4, 120.8, 107.6, 47.0, 33.9, 31.1, 17.5. HRMS (ESI): calculated for C 15H 14O 2N [M-H] 240.10191 found 240.10257.
